Author: beenknew
Text: you mentioned the first thing that popped into my head when i read this:  >What if we drift apart, or stop communicating (which I hope never happens.)? I won't have any motivation anymore. But hey, what if by then, I mature a bit more on this recovery thing?  and that’s good; you’re being pretty mature already by thinking ahead, but you should get a therapist before jumping into recovery. it’s good to have professional help for recovery anyway, but especially in a scenario where your ED could get worse, or you could relapse, etc.   the motivation itself is not bad though, no, you just need to be cautious and realistic.  *this is really sweet though, he sounds like a good friend.*
